properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 6:51PM CST until February 28 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for most of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* until Thursday February 27.
* At 6 PM Saturday the stage was 39.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 41.0 feet on Tuesday February 18.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Thursday February 13 and will
continue rising to near 41.0 feet by Tuesday February 18. The river
may fall below flood stage Thursday February 27.
* At 42.0 feet...In Tennessee, Pea Ridge Road is flooding. Lane to
homestead northwest of Pea Ridge Road just by the river is
flooding. Water begins to go over the Tennemo Levee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
